title: This Smart New Brand Wants To Makeover Your Medicine Cabinet

description: Many of us are still relying on conventional products with less-than-clean ingredients. Meet Hilma, a new brand that's hoping to change all that...
cleaned_text: Many of us have become total sleuths when it comes to reading food and beauty labels. We've made great strides in removing potentially harmful ingredients from our daily lives. But what about our medicine cabinets? Many of us are still relying on conventional over-the-counter products with potential side effects and less-than-clean ingredients.
